item.title: Create and host a blog with Hugo and GitHub Pages in less than 30 minutes
item.description: Do you want to start a blog and don’t want to lose a lot of time setting everything up? That was exactly my thought! I wanted to build a blog to write about my ramblings, but I didn’t want to spend long hours settings things up. After doing a little of research about what options are available nowadays I found that Hugo could be a good fit. What’s Hugo? Hugo is another static HTML and CSS website generator, it is written in Golang and it relies on markdown files.
